name: Kenneth Martinez
review: A solid biblical church that aims to preach God’s Word faithfully band live out the Gospel.

name: D D
review:
Having relocated from our Tenth Presbyterian church in center city Philadelphia we have settled into this amazing place of worship here at Covenant Reformed OPC Church. The liturgy is God glorifying and the people are lovely.
“Come to me, all who labor & are heavy laden, & I will give you rest.” Matthew 12:28

name: Max Bortnick
review: Well if you want to pray to God it's a good place to go

name: Renee Surgeon
review: Love worshiping with like minded people
